mapper.select: SELECT p.babyId, p.identity, p.parentName, p.phoneNumber, p.parentHead, p.address, p.parentId, p.pwd, p.monitorTime, p.attendanceTime, p.flower, p.token, p.tokenTime, p.registTime, p.gartenId, b.babyId mainBabyId FROM baby_info b join parent_info p on b.parentId=p.parentId where b.gartenId=#{gartenId} and b.parentId is not null and b.isValid=0 and p.isValid=0
SELECT * FROM worker＿info w where token=#{token} and job='总管理员' and w.isValid=0
SELECT * FROM feedback b left join garten_info g on g.gartenId=b.gartenId where b.isValid=0 order by b.time desc
select max(gartenId) from garten_info where isvalid=0;
select max(jobId) from attendance_no where isvalid=0 ;
SELECT * FROM garten_info g where g.isValid=0

SELECT b.babyName,b.babyId,b.birthday, b.height, b.health,b.hobby,b.specialty,b.gartenId,b.teacherId, b.babyHead, b.allergy, b.weight,b.sex,b.registTime, w.classId,c.leadClass,c.leadGrade FROM baby_info b LEFT JOIN `worker＿info` w ON FIND_IN_SET(w.workerId, b.teacherId) left join garten_class c on c.classId=w.classId WHERE b.babyId = #{babyId} AND (b.isValid = 0 or b.isValid is null) AND (w.isValid = 0 or w.isvalid is null) AND (c.isValid = 0 or c.isvalid is null) group by b.babyId
SELECT * from agent_audit a left join agent_info ai on a.resourceId=ai.agentId where resource=#{resource} and a.isvalid=0 and state=0
SELECT * from agent_audit where auditId=#{auditId} and isvalid=0
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(r.time) FROM ignore_time r WHERE r.gartenId = #{gartenId} and r.isValid=0
SELECT c.leadGrade from garten_class c WHERE c.gartenId = #{gartenId} and c.isValid=0 group by c.leadGrade
select * from garten_info

SELECT * FROM baby_info b LEFT JOIN baby_check_log c on b.babyId=c.babyId LEFT JOIN `worker＿info` w ON FIND_IN_SET(w.workerId, b.teacherId) WHERE w.gartenId = #{gartenId} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.time)=#{time} and b.isValid=0 and c.isValid=0 and w.isValid=0 group by b.babyId
SELECT * FROM worker＿info w where phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} and job='总管理员' and w.isValid=0
select count(1) from baby_info b where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.registTime)>#{start} and b.isvalid=0 and #{end}>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.registTime)
select count(1) from worker＿info w where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(w.registTime)>#{start} and w.isvalid=0 and #{end}>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(w.registTime)
select count(1) from parent_info p where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(p.registTime)>#{start} and p.isvalid=0 and #{end}>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(p.registTime)
select count(1) from baby_info b where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.registTime)>#{start} and b.isvalid=1 and #{end}>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.registTime)
select count(1) from worker＿info w where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(w.registTime)>#{start} and w.isvalid=1 and #{end}>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(w.registTime)
select count(1) from parent_info p where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(p.registTime)>#{start} and p.isvalid=1 and #{end}>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(p.registTime)
mapper.update: update agent_audit a set state=1 where auditId=#{auditId} and a.isValid=0
update agent_info i set frost=1 where agentId=#{agentId} and i.isvalid=0
update agent_info i set frost=0 where agentId=#{agentId} and i.isvalid=0

update garten_info g set g.gartenId=g.gartenId
, g.monitorTime=now()
,g.monitorTime=date_add((CASE WHEN g.monitorTime < now() THEN now() ELSE g.monitorTime end), interval #{count} month)
, g.attendanceTime=now()
,g.attendanceTime=date_add((CASE WHEN g.attendanceTime < now() THEN now() ELSE g.attendanceTime end), interval #{count} month)
where g.gartenId=#{gartenId} and g.isvalid=0
mapper.insert: insert into garten_info set phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, gartenGrade=#{gartenGrade}, gartenName=#{gartenName}, address=#{address}, pwd=#{pwd}, attendanceTime=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{attendanceTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), monitorTime=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{monitorTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), charge=#{charge}, agent=#{agent}, arriveStartTime=#{arriveStartTime}, leaveStartTime=#{leaveStartTime}, arriveEndTime=#{arriveEndTime}, leaveEndTime=#{leaveEndTime}, province=#{province}, city=#{city}, countries=#{countries}, teacherAttendanceFlag=#{teacherAttendanceFlag}, studentAttendanceFlag=#{studentAttendanceFlag}, contractNumber=#{contractNumber}, contractStart=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{contractStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), contractEnd=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{contractEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), organizationCode=#{organizationCode}, name=#{name}, token=#{token}

insert into worker＿info set gartenId=#{gartenId}, pwd=#{pwd}, workerName=#{name}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, education=#{education}, certificate=#{certificate}, chinese=#{chinese}, job=#{job}, workerId=#{jobId}, jobcall=#{jobcall}, token=#{token}
insert into garten_class set leadClass=#{leadClass}, leadGrade=#{leadGrade}, gartenId=#{gartenId}
mapper.delete: delete from garten_class where leadClass=#{leadClass}, leadGrade=#{leadGrade}, gartenId=#{gartenId}
mapper.update: update garten_info set attendanceTime=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{attendanceTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), monitorTime=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{monitorTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') where gartenId=#{gartenId} and isvalid=0
mapper.insert: insert into agent_info set phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, pwd=#{pwd}, agentGrade=#{agentGrade}, agentMoney=#{agentMoney}, creditMoney=#{creditMoney}, agentStartTime=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{agentStartTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), agentEndTime=FROM_UNIXTIME(#{agentEndTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), name=#{name}, agentName=#{agentName}, rebate=#{rebate}, province=#{province}, city=#{city}, countries=#{countries}, token=#{token}
mapper.select: select macId from attendance_machine where machineId=#{machineId}
mapper.update: update equipment set macId=#{macId} where macId=#{oldMacId}
mapper.select: select deviceSerial from equipment where cameraId=#{cameraId}
mapper.insert: insert into garten_video(type,gartenId,pointId,time,url,img,cameraId) values(#{type},#{gartenId},#{pointId},now(),#{url},#{img}, (select cameraId from equipment where deviceSerial=#{deviceSerial} and isValid=0))
mapper.update: update equipment set isValid=1 where cameraId=#{cameraId}
update garten_video set isValid=1 where cameraId=#{cameraId}
mapper.select: select * from equipment where deviceSerial=#{deviceSerial}
select max(machineId) from attendance_machine where isvalid=0;
mapper.update: update torder set isValid=1 where state=0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM parent_relation w
mapper.update: update activity_detail set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update garten_charge set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update garten_class set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update garten_info set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update garten_lesson set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update garten_photos set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update garten_recipe set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update garten_video set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update ignore_time set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update info_log set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update unusual set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update attendance_machine set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
update equipment set isValid=1 where gartenId=#{gartenId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM equipment_name e
mapper.insert: insert into equipment_name set equipmentName=#{equipmentName}, price=#{price}
mapper.select: select * from equipment_name where equipmentName=#{equipmentName}

select * from sale_service s where s.saleServiceId>#{start}*1000 and #{end}*1000+86400000>s.saleServiceId
and s.agentId in '('+${agentId}+')'
and s.state=state
and s.gartenId in '('+${gartenId}+')'
order by s.saleServiceId desc
select * from sale_service where saleServiceId=#{saleServiceId}
